name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Robert MARTIN

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Robert MARTIN.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as improvidently granted.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert F. Banks, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Lycoming Co., for appellant.
Charles J. Tague, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Lycoming Co., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
408 A.2d 1097
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Robert MARTIN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 1979.
Robert F. Banks, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Lycoming Co., for appellant.
Charles J. Tague, Jr., Asst. Public Defender, Lycoming Co., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
